item.title: Imperial Kitesurf: Zero2Hero
item.author: Leon Vanstone,
item.description: On the weekend of the 27th October, Imperial Kitesurf hit the Student Kitesufing (SKA) Zero2Hero weekend to teach our beginners how to kitesurf. But apparently some of you fools have been living in a cave, with your eyes closed and your fingers in your ears, because you don’t know what kitesurfing …
